name: controller_vscode

scripts.ui:prep: extest get-vscode --storage ./vscode-test-persistent -c 1.104.0 && extest get-chromedriver --storage ./vscode-test-persistent -c 1.104.0 && extest install-from-marketplace saoudrizwan.claude-dev --storage ./vscode-test-persistent

description: VS Code Extension Testing Framework with Persistent Logins
